title: Niklas and John
content: My name is Niklas Kamin. I currently live in Tübingen but I come from a village near Lüneburg in Lower Saxony (which is at the north of Germany). I study Media Studies and English Studies. In my free time, I love to play my guitar and sing, especially with friends. I also like sport such as swimming or judo. My favourite places to be here in Tübingen are the public swimming pools, especially the one outdoors, because I like swimming, but I also like the botanic garden to play music or hang out with friends.  I'm John Mao from Macau. I study Communication as a major and sociology as a minor. In my free time I like visiting foreign countries, I for example plan to visit either France, Austria or Holland next. I don't have any favourite places yet.
